testimonials.name: Sarah Chen
testimonials.text: The best dictionary app I've ever used! The inflection recognition saves me so much time when reading academic papers.

testimonials.text: As a professional writer, having instant definitions at my fingertips has transformed my workflow. The offline mode is a lifesaver!
